alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 11:58AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow in the mountains with a mix of rain and snow in the valleys early this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the mountains above 6000 feet MSL and 1 to 5 inches in the valleys below. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Emigration Summit, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, Bone, Wayan, Swan Valley, and Victor. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute due to road closures.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
